title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Glenn Powell hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Streaming Nikki Glaser hosted the Nov.
15 episode of "Saturday Night Live," with Olivia Dean as musical guest.
"SNL" recap: Musical guest Olivia Dean and host Glen Powell ahead of the November 15, 2025 episode of "Saturday Night Live.

title: Boston animal shelter receives $2M donation for facility construction
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The Animal Rescue League of Boston’s new facility has been under construction since the spring and is expected to be completed in 2026.
The Animal Rescue League of Boston received a $2 million donation to fund construction of its new three-story facility in the South End.

Animal Rescue League of Boston By Darin Zullo November 16, 2025 | 10:23 AM 1 minute to read A Boston animal shelter organization has received the largest single gift in its history for a new facility, according to the Boston Business Journal.

title: Person shot on Beacon Hill, hospitalized with life-threatening injuries
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime The shooting victim has not yet been identified but was taken to a hospital with life-threatening injuries Friday, police said.
By Darin Zullo November 16, 2025 | 9:24 AM Less than a minute to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
A person has been hospitalized with life-threatening injuries after they were shot Friday morning on Beacon Hill, according to Boston police.

title: AJ Dybantsa shines, but future NBA star’s Boston homecoming spoiled by UConn
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "That's as high a level of shot-making as you're going to see in college basketball.
" AJ Dybantsa scored 25 points in his first college game in Boston.
Barry Chin/Globe Staff By Conor Ryan November 16, 2025 | 12:24 AM 4 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Here’s why Joe Mazzulla isn’t worried about Hugo Gonzalez’s slow start to the season offensively
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Boston Celtics "He's proven that he can play and can impact winning.
" Joe Mazzulla doesn't seem overly concerned with the minutes Hugo Gonzalez is giving him this season.
(Danielle Parhizkaran/Globe Staff) Hugo Gonzalez didn’t take the conventional route that many Celtics rookies have followed over the last few seasons.

title: Bruins’ Charlie McAvoy exits game after appearing to take a slap shot to the face
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Boston Bruins McAvoy was quickly ruled out for the rest of the night.
Charlie McAvoy left Saturday's game early and did not return.
(AP Photo/David Zalubowski) The Bruins might have been dealt a brutal blow regarding their star defenseman on Saturday night.

title: 5 teams that could make sense for possible Jarren Duran trade following GM Meetings
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox Duran has been speculated to be a trade candidate for several months.
Jarren Duran might be the odd man out for the Red Sox in the outfield.
(AP Photo/Scott Marshall, file) By Conor Roche November 15, 2025 | 5:09 PM 5 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Bill Belichick was reportedly never in consideration to become Giants’ next head coach
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots Belichick removed himself from consideration for all NFL head coaching gigs on Friday.
Bill Belichick is in the midst of his first season as North Carolina's head coach.

(AP Photo/Ben McKeown) By Conor Roche November 15, 2025 | 4:13 PM 2 minutes to read While Bill Belichick took himself out of the running for the Giants’ head coach vacancy, he might not have needed to make that statement on Friday.

title: Review & setlist: Boston believes in the power of Geese
author: Gwen Egan
bullets: Concert Reviews Amid Geese's meteoric rise, the band performed at Paradise Rock Club on Friday.
Geese performed at Paradise Rock Club on Friday night.
Tim Nagle By Gwen Egan November 15, 2025 | 3:14 PM 4 minutes to read 2025 will probably not be denoted in the history books as the year of belief.

title: Review & setlist: John Fogerty shows perseverance at MGM Music Hall
author: Marc Hirsh
bullets: Concert Reviews The 80-year-old Rock And Roll Hall Of Famer played with energy and excitement, as if he was riding a high that had been far too long in coming.
John Fogerty brought his "Legacy Tour" to Boston on Friday.
Mike Morgan / Ripe Melon Photography By Marc Hirsh November 15, 2025 | 1:29 PM 4 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.
